channel.title: esther on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in esther on Barefoot Rob

item.title: last(?) lunch with Esther
item.description: 15:47 Thursday 27 July 2017 JST I ate lunch with Esther in Ueno station before she moves to Okinawa. It sounds like she’s found a good job down there; I hope it works out well!

item.title: hiking day
item.description: 21:37 Sunday 19 April 2015 JST Great fun barefoot hiking today around Mt Mitake! Rohini joined the barefoot lifestyle and we clambored up some rocks, including up the back side! At the top, oops! I stubbed my toe.
